foreignData.name: Lied des Blutes
foreignData.text: Lege die obersten vier Karten Deiner Bibliothek auf Deinen Friedhof. Alle Kreaturen, die in diesem Zug angreifen, erhalten +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges, für jede Kreaturenkarte, die auf diese Weise auf dem Friedhof landet.

name: Song of Blood
originalText: Put the top four cards from your library into your graveyard. For each creature card put into your graveyard in this way, all creatures that attack this turn get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If a creature attacks more than once in a turn, it gets the bonus each time.

text: Mill four cards. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.
